Coreen Simpson.lighting: Analog film textures, available light with occasional flash.
Coreen Simpson.composition: Tight street framing, environmental portraits, candid angles.
Coreen Simpson.signature: Harlem cultural context embedded in every frame.

David LaChapelle.lighting: Highly artificial, multi-colored gels, theatrical strobes.
David LaChapelle.composition: Wide symmetrical framing, baroque layering, overwhelming detail.
David LaChapelle.color_palette: Hyper-saturated neons, candy colors, electric contrast.
David LaChapelle.signature: Pop-art excess, celebrity as iconography, visual overload.

Emanuele Ferrari.lighting: Soft window light, golden hour, minimal fill.
Emanuele Ferrari.composition: Close crops on skin/texture, shallow DoF, negative space.
Emanuele Ferrari.color_palette: Warm skin tones, muted earth, creamy highlights.
Emanuele Ferrari.signature: Skin as landscape, sensuality through subtlety.

Juergen Teller.composition: Snapshot aesthetic, off-center subjects, messy framing.

Kacper Kasprzyk.lighting: Cold studio light, even fill, controlled shadows.
Kacper Kasprzyk.composition: Centered subjects, clean negative space, grid-like structure.
Kacper Kasprzyk.color_palette: Cool pastels, ice blue, clinical white.
Kacper Kasprzyk.signature: Fashion meets Bauhaus, human form as architecture.

Mario Testino.lighting: Balanced studio/natural mix, beauty dish key light.
Mario Testino.composition: Dynamic poses, full-body framing, aspirational angles.
Mario Testino.color_palette: Warm golden tones, sun-kissed skin, rich contrast.
Mario Testino.signature: Celebrity glamour, effortless luxury, Latin warmth.

Tim Walker.lighting: Soft diffused dream tones, overcast daylight feel.
Tim Walker.composition: Wide establishing shots, subjects dwarfed by fantasy sets.
Tim Walker.color_palette: Pastel fantasy, dusty rose, powder blue, soft gold.
Tim Walker.signature: Fashion as fairy tale, handmade props, childlike wonder.

Viviane Sassen.lighting: High-contrast direct sunlight, hard shadows as design element.
Viviane Sassen.composition: Radical cropping, bodies as abstract shapes, shadow play.
Viviane Sassen.color_palette: Bold primaries, deep shadows, saturated African palette.
Viviane Sassen.signature: Shadow geometry, limbs as composition, Africa as muse.

Aaron Tilley.lighting: High-precision studio, clean key with minimal shadow.
Aaron Tilley.composition: Centered subject, mathematical precision, suspended motion.
Aaron Tilley.color_palette: Bold solid backgrounds, monochromatic with accent pop.
Aaron Tilley.signature: Objects on the edge of disaster, visual tension.

Carl Kleiner.style: Minimalist geometric, food/object as graphic element.
Carl Kleiner.composition: Overhead flat-lay, grid arrangements, obsessive symmetry.
Carl Kleiner.color_palette: Pastel backgrounds, candy tones, graphic contrast.
Carl Kleiner.signature: IKEA cookbook aesthetic, food as design material.

Daniel Sannwald.lighting: Experimental gels, neon accents, UV and blacklight.
Daniel Sannwald.composition: Dynamic angles, warped perspectives, layered digital composites.
Daniel Sannwald.color_palette: Electric neon, deep black, chrome reflections.
Daniel Sannwald.lens: Wide-angle 24mm for distortion, macro for texture.

Irving Penn.style: Elegant simplicity, reductive still life mastery.
Irving Penn.lighting: North-light studio, single source, controlled fall-off.
Irving Penn.composition: Tight framing, grey/white backgrounds, object isolation.
Irving Penn.color_palette: Muted neutrals, platinum tones, subtle warm shifts.
Irving Penn.signature: Corner portraits, decaying objects elevated to art.

Jonathan Knowles.style: High-speed liquid, splash and pour specialist.
Jonathan Knowles.composition: Centered product, liquid in motion framing the hero.
Jonathan Knowles.color_palette: Clean whites, vivid liquid colors, glass-clear tones.
Jonathan Knowles.lens: 100mm macro, medium telephoto for splash detail.
Jonathan Knowles.signature: Frozen liquid crowns, impossible pours, beverage hero shots.

Jonathan Zawada.lighting: Synthetic rendered light, impossible light sources.
Jonathan Zawada.color_palette: Iridescent gradients, holographic, alien color shifts.
Jonathan Zawada.lens: Virtual camera, no physical lens constraints.

Karl Taylor.lighting: Complex multi-light setups, 4–6 light precision rigs.
Karl Taylor.composition: Hero angle at 30–45°, controlled reflections, clean negative space.
Karl Taylor.color_palette: True-to-product color, neutral backgrounds, precise white balance.
Karl Taylor.lens: 100mm macro, 85mm for hero, tilt-shift for plane control.

Markus Jans.lighting: Dark focused chiaroscuro, single dramatic side light.
Markus Jans.composition: Dutch master arrangements, layered depth, intimate scale.
Markus Jans.color_palette: Deep browns, burgundy, dark greens, old-world warmth.
Markus Jans.signature: Renaissance meets photography, food as vanitas.

Mike Kus.lighting: Natural daylight, window side-light, golden hour warmth.
Mike Kus.composition: 45° tabletop angle, lifestyle context, breathing negative space.
Mike Kus.color_palette: Warm naturals, earthy tones, inviting warmth.
Mike Kus.signature: Products in real life, approachable commercial warmth.

Rich Stapleton.lighting: Soft directional natural light, gentle shadow gradients.
Rich Stapleton.composition: Asymmetric balance, organic textures as background, quiet space.
Rich Stapleton.color_palette: Stone, linen, clay, muted sage, desaturated earth.
Rich Stapleton.signature: Kinfolk aesthetic, objects with patina and soul.

Robert Clark.lighting: Even studio light, cross-polarized for texture detail.
Robert Clark.composition: Specimen-style isolation, taxonomic grids, documentary framing.
Robert Clark.color_palette: True-to-life colors, neutral white backgrounds, no grading.
Robert Clark.signature: National Geographic detail, science meets beauty.

Thomas Prior.style: Accidental art, found composition, urban still life.
Thomas Prior.lighting: Soft ambient glows, mixed artificial/natural sources.
Thomas Prior.composition: Overhead or straight-on, objects as they were found, raw framing.
Thomas Prior.color_palette: Muted urban tones, faded signage colors, nostalgic warmth.
Thomas Prior.signature: Beauty in the mundane, street-level observations.

Tim Tadder.lighting: Intense multi-strobe setups, rim lights for separation.
Tim Tadder.composition: Dynamic action framing, product as hero, explosive elements surrounding.
Tim Tadder.color_palette: Vivid saturated primaries, deep blacks, high contrast.
Tim Tadder.signature: Water/paint explosions on heads, extreme action freeze.
